body: In addition, extensive monitoring and testing of HCWs began in early May 2014. As part of this enhanced surveillance of HCWs, 5 MERS-CoV infections (4 asymptomatic and 1 mild) were detected. †Refers to the cumulative probability that the mean expected number of substitutions is greater than or equal to the observed number of substitutions. pvalues for accepting or rejecting the null hypothesis were significant at the 0.05 level after using the Bonferroni correction to adjust the p-value for each hypothesis to p<0.0167.
